tool_description: Analyzes market data quality by detecting missing values, duplicate entries, inconsistent pricing, and other data integrity issues that could affect backtesting accuracy.

data_source.description: Source identifier or path to the market data to validate

validation_rules.description: List of validation checks to perform

price_change_threshold.description: Maximum allowed single-period price change (as percentage)

error_messages: Invalid data source: The specified data source cannot be accessed or does not exist
Unsupported validation rule: Use supported rules (missing_values, duplicates, price_consistency, volume_check, timestamp_gaps)
Invalid threshold: price_change_threshold must be between 0.01 and 1.0
usage: Provide data source path and optionally specify validation rules and thresholds. Returns comprehensive quality assessment report.

overall_quality_score.description: Quality score from 0-100 indicating data reliability

issues_found.description: List of data quality issues detected

recommendation.description: Recommended actions based on quality assessment
